overview:
Scott Badenoch purports to be a visionary and evangelist for the green movement, with the claim that he has “new” environmentally-friendly solutions to green issues that will drive the market to greater heights. At his website that he co-founded and of which he is currently CEO, CreativeCitizen.com, one can find “Creative Solutions” for living more environmentally friendly lives. Mr. Badenoch’s involvement in the green community also includes membership in the Green Business Networking’s steering committee, and BALLE’s LA chapter (Business Alliance for Local Living Economies) called Local First LA.

Mr. Badenoch earned his Juris Doctorate and Master’s degree in Mediation, Negotiation and Arbitration from Pepperdine University and is a writer for TriplePundit.com and EcoTimes.com. He is an active attorney in the state of California and is a member of the Los Angeles County Bar Association, California State Bar and the American Bar Association. He studied poetry at Northwestern University for his Bachelorâ€™s degree.
